Name: Linear Programming
Description: Optimization where the objective function and constraints are linear.

Name: Integer Programming
Description: LP with the added constraint that some or all variables must be integers.

Name: Nonlinear Programming
Description: Optimization where the objective function or constraints are nonlinear.

Name: Convex Optimization
Description: Optimization where the objective function is convex and the feasible region is convex.

Name: Dynamic Programming
Description: Breaking down a complex problem into smaller overlapping subproblems.

Name: Combinatorial Optimization
Description: Finding an optimal object from a finite set of objects. Often discrete.

Name: Network Optimization
Description: Optimization problems formulated on graphs or networks.

Name: Stochastic Optimization
Description: Optimization under uncertainty; deals with random variables.

Name: Global Optimization
Description: Finding the global optimum in a non-convex problem.

Name: Geometric Programming
Description: Optimization with posynomial objective function and constraints.

Name: Quadratic Programming
Description: Optimization with a quadratic objective function and linear constraints.
